properties.name: Tag
properties.description: A tag assigned to the content control. The same tag can be assigned to several content controls so that it is possible to make reference to them in your code.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: A unique identifier of the content control. It can be used to search for a certain content control and make reference to it in the code.

properties.name: Lock
properties.description: A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not: 0 - only deleting, 1 - no deleting or editing, 2 - only editing, 3 - full access.

properties.name: InternalId
properties.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control. It is used for all operations with content controls.

ContentControlLock.name: ContentControlLock
ContentControlLock.description:
A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not:

  • 0 - only deleting
  • 1 - disable deleting or editing
  • 2 - only editing
  • 3 - full access

ContentControlType.name: ContentControlType
ContentControlType.description:
A numeric value that specifies the content control type:

  • 1 - block content control
  • 2 - inline content control
  • 3 - row content control
  • 4 - cell content control

properties.name: ContentControlProperties
properties.description: The content control properties.

properties.name: Script
properties.description: A script that will be executed to generate the data within the content control (can be replaced with the Url parameter).

properties.name: Url
properties.description: A link to the shared file (can be replaced with the Script parameter).

properties.name: Id
properties.description: A unique identifier of the content control. It can be used to search for a certain content control and make reference to it in the code.

properties.name: Tag
properties.description: A tag assigned to the content control. The same tag can be assigned to several content controls so that it is possible to make reference to them in the code.

properties.name: Lock
properties.description: A value that defines if it is possible to delete and/or edit the content control or not.

properties.name: InternalId
properties.description: A unique internal identifier of the content control.

properties.name: Alias
properties.description: The alias attribute.

properties.name: PlaceHolderText
properties.description: The content control placeholder text.

properties.name: Appearance
properties.description: Defines if the content control is shown as the bounding box (1) or not (2).

properties.name: Color
properties.description: The color for the current content control in the RGB format.

properties.name: Color.R
properties.description: Red color component value.

properties.name: Color.G
properties.description: Green color component value.

properties.name: Color.B
properties.description: Blue color component value.

DocumentEditingRestrictions.name: DocumentEditingRestrictions
DocumentEditingRestrictions.description:
The document editing restrictions:

  • none - no editing restrictions,
  • comments - allows editing comments,
  • forms - allows editing form fields,
  • readOnly - does not allow editing.

TextPartType.name: TextPartType
TextPartType.description:
Specifies if the whole text or only its part will be returned or replaced:

  • entirely - replaces/returns the whole text,
  • beforeCursor - replaces/returns only the part of the text before the cursor,
  • afterCursor - replaces/returns only the part of the text after the cursor.

properties.name: Parent
properties.description: The content control parent. For example, oParagraph.

properties.name: Pos
properties.description: The content control position within the parent object.

properties.name: Count
properties.description: A number of elements in the parent object.

properties.name: Id
properties.description: The comment ID.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: An object which contains the comment data.

properties.name: UserName
properties.description: The comment author.

properties.name: Text
properties.description: The comment text.

properties.name: Time
properties.description: The time when the comment was posted (in milliseconds).

properties.name: Solved
properties.description: Specifies if the comment is resolved (true) or not (false).

properties.name: Replies
properties.description: An array containing the comment replies represented as the CommentData object.

properties.name: Checked
properties.description: Defines if the content control checkbox is checked or not.

properties.name: CheckedSymbol
properties.description: A symbol in the HTML code format that is used when the checkbox is checked.

properties.name: UncheckedSymbol
properties.description: A symbol in the HTML code format that is used when the checkbox is not checked.

properties.name: DateFormat
properties.description: A format in which the date will be displayed. For example: "MM/DD/YYYY", "dddd,\ mmmm\ dd,\ yyyy", "DD\ MMMM\ YYYY", "MMMM\ DD,\ YYYY", "DD-MMM-YY", "MMMM\ YY", "MMM-YY", "MM/DD/YYYY\ hh:mm\ AM/PM", "MM/DD/YYYY\ hh:mm:ss\ AM/PM", "hh:mm", "hh:mm:ss", "hh:mm\ AM/PM", "hh:mm:ss:\ AM/PM".

properties.name: Date
properties.description: The current date and time.

properties.name: Data
properties.description: OLE object data (internal format).

properties.name: ImageData
properties.description: An image in the base64 format stored in the OLE object and used by the plugin.

properties.name: ApplicationId
properties.description: An identifier of the plugin which can edit the current OLE object and must be of the asc.{UUID} type.

properties.name: InternalId
properties.description: The OLE object identifier which is used to work with OLE object added to the document.

properties.name: ParaDrawingId
properties.description: An identifier of the drawing object containing the current OLE object.

properties.name: Width
properties.description: The OLE object width measured in millimeters.

properties.name: Height
properties.description: The OLE object height measured in millimeters.

properties.name: WidthPix
properties.description: The OLE object image width in pixels.

properties.name: HeightPix
properties.description: The OLE object image height in pixels.

properties.name: FieldId
properties.description: Field identifier.

properties.name: Value
properties.description: Field value.

properties.name: Content
properties.description: Field text content.
